comment: Full disclosure, the label got me.  Totally worth it, I've bought probably 7 or 8 bottles at this point.  I keep it like PBR, just good to have on hand.
For an amazing price this straight Bourbon is really easy to drink and smooth.
For the Price this Bourbon is very good!  Easy to drink.  I would have thought it would have been more expensive with how good it was!
